About Work Fun

Introduction

Welcome the portfolio of Sarah Rivera, a Computer Graphics Artist with a passion for pixels. My curiosity has given me a wide range of experience in 3D Animation, Graphic Design, and Web Design. You can learn more about my history below or browse my portfolio through the menu above. Thanks for visiting!

My story so far...

I started out my career as 3D Graphics Artist at VMAX Technologies in 2008. We were a small team of programmers and artists creating technical simulations and animations for clients in the Oil and Gas industry.

After I moved to Houston, I was hired at Cameron International as a 3D Animator/Graphic Designer. I continued to hone my 3D and Graphic Design skills while expanding my experience with ActionScript 3/Flash. I created motion graphics and rendered complex animations of Cameron’s equipment syncing them all to voice and music. I learned to love InDesign there; layout became a sort of zen activity that I still enjoy.

When I moved to Austin, I was hired at ITWatchDogs as a Graphic Designer/Marketing Specialist where I learned about marketing from a business /social media point of view. I picked up MailChimp’s custom email scripting and templating, and how different a well-coded email campaign is from a landing page.

As a Marketing Artist at Kingsisle Entertainment, I designed and animated kickass graphics for MMO and Mobile games.

My current position is at Workplace Answers, which was recently acquired by Everfi. It's a combination of great people and rewarding projects. I couldn't ask for a better place to call home!
